text: Emilio Ernest Delgado (May 8, 1940 â€“ March 10, 2022) was an American actor and singer. He was best known for his role as Luis, the Fix-it Shop owner, on the children's television series Sesame Street. Delgado played Luis from 1971 until 2016. He was born in Calexico, California. In 2020, Delgado was diagnosed with multiple myeloma. He died from the disease at his home in New York City on March 10, 2022, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from California Category:Actors from New York City Category:Singers from California Category:Singers from New York City
title: Emilio Delgado
